title: english
t: Turn up the volume to hear the notes
d: You can turn the sound on and off anytime from the home screen or the settings. Tap on a note to listen to it again.
t1: Learn as you play and increase your score
d1: You can view your best and current score separately according to the type of the game.
t2: Set the duration in timed games
d2: You can set the duration in timed games and pause the game whenever you want.
t3: Start the game in timed games
d3: Tap on the green play icon to start the game in timed games. Tap on a note to listen to it again.
t4: Recognize the notes and select the answers
d4: Tap on the answer you want to select in timed games.
d5: You can adjust all settings from the settings. You can also log out anytime from the settings.
